name: Stretchodocus
description:
[Made in 3 days for NOKIA 3310 JAM 5]

Controls

Arrow keys controls: 

  • Up: stretch (hold) / relax (release) 
  • Right/Left: navigate 

Numpad controls: 

  • [2] stretch (hold) / relax (release) 
  • [1] / [3] navigate 
Rules

Stretch your neck to reach the juicy apples! (also avoid obstacles, it hurts a lot) 

You have 3 stretches per round, use it wisely to eat as much as possible. 

You don't have to eat all apples to go to the next round, but remember that the more you eat, the highest is the score... And you also get extra points when you eat multiple apples on a single stretch. 

Credits

Code/Art/Game Design by me :) 
Sounds from the official Nokia 3310 Jam Ressources, by Trix
Font "EFFORTS PRO", by SOMEPX
